ing: 2 (15.5 ounce) cans chick peas (garbanzo beans), rinsed and drained
des: "Chick peas have a very low glycemic index, which means they create steady blood sugar and are especially healthful for diabetics. Curry powder contains curcumin, an antioxidant believed to be anti-inflammatory and anti-cancer."
ins: Put all ingredients in a food processor and blend until smooth. Serve (drizzled with olive oil, if desired) with pita chips.
